sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: vtkDecimatePolylineFilter is a filter to reduce the number of lines in a polyline. The algorithm functions by evaluating an error metric for each vertex (i.e., the distance of the vertex to a line defined from the two vertices on either side of the vertex). Then, these vertices are placed into a priority queue, and those with larger errors are deleted first. The decimation continues until the target reduction is reached.
To create an instance of class vtkDecimatePolylineFilter, simply invoke its constructor as follows obj = vtkDecimatePolylineFilter
